properties.comment: Default xml properties file for localization purposes
properties.entry: Welcome to RG-RPG! A Gal Game full featured fantasy RPG.
Prints the help of the passed command or lists all available commands
Prints the help of the passed command or lists all available commands
Listing available commands:
There is no help for specified command '%s'
Creates a new entity, with the specified name
Creates a new entity, with the specified name. An entity can be a player, or a character, you should specify it. new (player|character) {name} e.g. new player player1 e.g. new character mialee
Player '%s' already exists!
Exits from the Commands Interpreter
Exits from the Commands Interpreter
Executes the specified command iteratively n times
Deletes an entity, with the specified name
Deletes an entity, with the specified name. An entity can be a player, or a character, you should specify it. del (player|character) {name} e.g. del player player1 e.g. del character mialee
Performs the login to the game
Performs the login to the game.
Starts a new game, or continue a new undone one
Starts a new game, or continue a new undone one.
Prints some info about the program and its version numbers
Prints some info about the program and its version numbers.

RG-RPG is a Java-based text, roleplaying-gal game, in which you have to carry many girls. The RG-RPG acronym is a recursive one and it means "RG-RPG is a Gal Role playing game Pointing on Girls." Copyright (C) 2013 by Alessandro Accardo <julius8774@gmail.com>
RG-RPG version %d.%02d.%03d
